makefile.raw:
include $(PAPARAZZI_HOME)/sw/ext/ardrone2_vision/Makefile.paths
VISION_MODULE_FOLDER = $(DIR_MODULES)/ObstacleAvoidSkySegmentation
$(TARGET).srcs += $(VISION_MODULE_FOLDER)/avoid_navigation.c $(TARGET).CFLAGS += -I$(DIR_MODULES) -I$(DIR_CV) -I$(DIR_LIB) -pthread $(TARGET).LDFLAGS += -pthread -lrt
ifeq ($(TARGET),ap) $(TARGET).srcs += $(VISION_MODULE_FOLDER)/sky_seg_avoid_v4l.c $(TARGET).srcs += $(VISION_MODULE_FOLDER)/obstacleavoidskysegmentation_code.c $(TARGET).srcs += $(DIR_CV)/skysegmentation/skysegmentation.c $(TARGET).srcs += $(DIR_CV)/encoding/jpeg.c $(TARGET).srcs += $(DIR_CV)/encoding/rtp.c $(TARGET).srcs += $(DIR_CV)/trig.c $(TARGET).srcs += $(DIR_LIB)/udp/socket.c $(TARGET).srcs += $(DIR_LIB)/v4l/video.c endif
ifneq ($(TARGET),ap) $(TARGET).srcs += $(VISION_MODULE_FOLDER)/sky_seg_avoid_sim.c endif
all: make -C $(VISION_MODULE_FOLDER)/visionresult/
